p: Tea tree EO is a product of water vapor distillation of leaves and top twigs of Melaluleca alternifolia Maiden and Betch and other Melaleuca species ( M. linariifolia Smith, M. dissitiflora F. Mueller) [ 33]. According to research [ 126] aimed at standardizing the raw material for the production of essential oil for pharmaceutical purposes, Melaleuca alterniforia is a shrub with a height of about 7 m, characterized by stratified and flaky bark and oblong, pointed leaves with a characteristic pattern.
